thread.title: A Beautiful Longhaired Tuxedo Cat Goes Nighty Night All by Herself In a Tiny Human-Styled Bed
thread.title_full: A Beautiful Longhaired Tuxedo Cat Goes Nighty Night All by Herself In a Tiny Human-Styled Bed

author: Lori Dorn
title: A Beautiful Longhaired Tuxedo Cat Goes Nighty Night All by Herself In a Tiny Human-Styled Bed
text:
When her humans go to bed, a beautiful longhaired tuxedo cat named Sophie knows that it’s also time for her to go nighty-night. At whatever time they decide, Sophie puts herself to sleep on her tiny human styled bed that has everything she needs to get a good night’s sleep, including at least one human who’s always willing to tuck her in.
A post shared by Sophie – Got Toe Fluff? (@sophielovestuna) on Feb 19, 2017 at 5:28pm PST 

A post shared by Sophie – Got Toe Fluff? (@sophielovestuna) on Mar 4, 2017 at 5:31pm PST 

A post shared by Sophie – Got Toe Fluff? (@sophielovestuna) on Feb 13, 2017 at 5:19pm PST 

via reddit
